rows.arabic: الٓمٓ
rows.translation: Alif. Lam. Mim.
rows.transliteration: alif lām mīm

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

rows.arabic: تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
rows.translation: These are revelations of the wise Scripture,
rows.transliteration: tilka āyātul kitābil ḥakīm

rows.arabic: هُدًى وَرَحْمَةً لِّلْمُحْسِنِينَ
rows.translation: A guidance and a mercy for the good,
rows.transliteration: hudan waraḥmatan lil-muḥsinīn

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
rows.translation: Those who establish worship and pay the poor-due and have sure faith in the Hereafter.
rows.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūnaṣ ṣalāta wayu-tūnaz zakāta wahum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūn

rows.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدًى مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
rows.translation: Such have guidance from their Lord. Such are the successful.
rows.transliteration: ulā-ika `alā hudan min rabbihim ۖ wa-ulā-ika humul mufliḥūn

rows.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَشْتَرِى لَهْوَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ لِيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ وَيَتَّخِذَهَا هُزُوًا ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ
rows.translation: And of mankind is he who payeth for mere pastime of discourse, that he may mislead from Allah's way without knowledge, and maketh it the butt of mockery. For such there is a shameful doom.
rows.transliteration: wa minan nāsi man yashtarī lahwal ḥadīthi liyuḍilla `an sabīlillāhi bighayri `il-min wayattakhidhahā huzuwā ۚ ulā-ika lahum `adhābun muhīn

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا وَلَّىٰ مُسْتَكْبِرًا كَأَن لَّمْ يَسْمَعْهَا كَأَنَّ فِىٓ أُذُنَيْهِ وَقْرًا ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
rows.translation: And when Our revelations are recited unto him he turneth away in pride as if he heard them not, as if there were a deafness in his ears. So give him tidings of a painful doom.
rows.transliteration: wa idhā tutlā `alayhi āyātunā wallā mustakbiran ka-an lam yasma`hā ka-anna fī udhunayhi waqrā ۖ fabashhirhu bi`adhābin alīm

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
rows.translation: Lo! those who believe and do good works, for them are the gardens of delight,
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātun na`īm

rows.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
rows.translation: Wherein they will abide. It is a promise of Allah in truth. He is the Mighty, the Wise.
rows.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā ۖ wa`dallāhi ḥaqqā ۚ wahuwal `azīzul ḥakīm

rows.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ بِغَيْرِ عَمَدٍ تَرَوْنَهَا ۖ وَأَلْقَىٰ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ رَوَٰسِىَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمْ وَبَثَّ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ دَآبَّةٍ ۚ وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ
rows.translation: He hath created the heavens without supports that ye can see, and hath cast into the earth firm hills, so that it quake not with you; and He hath dispersed therein all kinds of beasts. And We send down water from the sky and We cause (plants) of every goodly kind to grow therein.
rows.transliteration: khalaqas samāwāti bighayri `amadin tarawnahā ۖ wa-alqā fil-arḍi rawāsiya an tamīda bikum wabathha fīhā min kulli dābbah ۚ wa-anzalnā minas samā-i mā-an fa-anbatnā fīhā min kulli zawjin karīm

rows.arabic: هَـٰذَا خَلْقُ ٱللَّهِ فَأَرُونِى مَاذَا خَلَقَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦ ۚ بَلِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: This is the Creation of Allah. Now show me that which those (ye worship) beside Him have created. Nay, but the wrong-doers are in error manifest!
rows.transliteration: hādhā khalqullāhi fa-arūnī mādhā khalaqal ladhīna min dūnih ۚ baliẓ ẓālimūna fī ḍalālin mubīn

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا لُقْمَـٰنَ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ أَنِ ٱشْكُرْ لِلَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَشْكُرْ فَإِنَّمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ حَمِيدٌ
rows.translation: And verily We gave Luqman wisdom, saying: Give thanks unto Allah; and whosoever giveth thanks, he giveth thanks for (the good of) his soul. And whosoever refuseth - Lo! Allah is Absolute, Owner of Praise.
rows.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā luqmānal ḥikmata anish-kur lillāh ۚ wa man yashkur fa-innamā yashkuru linafsih ۖ wa man kafara fa-innallāha ghaniyyun ḥamīd

rows.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ لُقْمَـٰنُ لِٱبْنِهِۦ وَهُوَ يَعِظُهُۥ يَـٰبُنَىَّ لَا تُشْرِكْ بِٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلشِّرْكَ لَظُلْمٌ عَظِيمٌ
rows.translation: And (remember) when Luqman said unto his son, when he was exhorting him: O my dear son! Ascribe no partners unto Allah. Lo! to ascribe partners (unto Him) is a tremendous wrong -
rows.transliteration: wa idh qāla luqmānu lībnihi wahuwa ya`iẓuhu yābunayya lā tushrik billāh ۖ innash shirka laẓul-mun `aẓīm

rows.arabic: وَوَصَّيْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيْهِ حَمَلَتْهُ أُمُّهُۥ وَهْنًا عَلَىٰ وَهْنٍ وَفِصَـٰلُهُۥ فِى عَامَيْنِ أَنِ ٱشْكُرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَيْكَ إِلَىَّ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
rows.translation: And We have enjoined upon man concerning his partners - His mother beareth him in weakness upon weakness, and his weaning is in two years - Give thanks unto Me and unto thy parents. Unto Me is the journeying.
rows.transliteration: wawaṣṣaynal-insāna biwālidayhi ḥamalat-hu ummuhu wahnan `alā wahnin wafiṣāluhu fī `āmayni anish-kur lī waliwālidayka ilayyal maṣīr

rows.arabic: وَإِن جَـٰهَدَاكَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تُشْرِكَ بِى مَا لَيْسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلْمٌ فَلَا تُطِعْهُمَا ۖ وَصَاحِبْهُمَا فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا مَعْرُوفًا ۖ وَٱتَّبِعْ سَبِيلَ مَنْ أَنَابَ إِلَىَّ ۚ ثُمَّ إِلَىَّ مَرْجِعُكُمْ فَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: But if they strive with thee to make thee ascribe unto Me as partner that of which thou hast no knowledge, then obey them not. Consort with them in the world kindly, and follow the path of him who repenteth unto Me. Then unto Me will be your return, and I shall tell you what ye used to do -
rows.transliteration: wa in jāhadāka `alā an tushrika bī mā laysa laka bihi `il-mun falā tuṭi`humā ۖ waṣāḥibhumā fid dunyā ma`rūfā ۖ wattabi` sabīla man anāba ilayy ۚ thumma ilayya marji`ukum fa-unabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn

rows.arabic: يَـٰبُنَىَّ إِنَّهَآ إِن تَكُ مِثْقَالَ حَبَّةٍ مِّنْ خَرْدَلٍ فَتَكُن فِى صَخْرَةٍ أَوْ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ أَوْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَأْتِ بِهَا ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٌ
rows.translation: O my dear son! Lo! though it be but the weight of a grain of mustard-seed, and though it be in a rock, or in the heavens, or in the earth, Allah will bring it forth. Lo! Allah is Subtile, Aware.
rows.transliteration: yābunayya innahā in taku mithqāla ḥabbatim min khardalin fatakun fī ṣakhratin aw fis samāwāti aw fil-arḍi ya-ti bihallāh ۚ innallāha laṭīfun khabīr

rows.arabic: يَـٰبُنَىَّ أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأْمُرْ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَٱنْهَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَكَ ۖ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ عَزْمِ ٱلْأُمُورِ
rows.translation: O my dear son! Establish worship and enjoin kindness and forbid iniquity, and persevere whatever may befall thee. Lo! that is of the steadfast heart of things.
rows.transliteration: yābunayya aqimiṣ ṣalāta wa-mur bil ma`rūfi wanha `anil munkari waṣbir `alā mā aṣābak ۖ inna dhālika min `azmil-umūr

rows.arabic: وَلَا تُصَعِّرْ خَدَّكَ لِلنَّاسِ وَلَا تَمْشِ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مَرَحًا ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخْتَالٍ فَخُورٍ
rows.translation: Turn not thy cheek in scorn toward folk, nor walk with pertness in the land. Lo! Allah loveth not each braggart boaster.
rows.transliteration: walā tuṣa``ir khaddaka linnāsi walā tamshi fil-arḍi maraḥā ۖ innallāha lā yuḥibbu kulla mukhtālin fakhūr

rows.arabic: وَٱقْصِدْ فِى مَشْيِكَ وَٱغْضُضْ مِن صَوْتِكَ ۚ إِنَّ أَنكَرَ ٱلْأَصْوَٰتِ لَصَوْتُ ٱلْحَمِيرِ
rows.translation: Be modest in thy bearing and subdue thy voice. Lo! the harshest of all voices is the voice of the ass.
rows.transliteration: waqṣid fī mashyika waghḍuḍ min ṣawtik ۚ inna ankaral-aṣwāti laṣawtul ḥamīr

rows.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَأَسْبَغَ عَلَيْكُمْ نِعَمَهُۥ ظَـٰهِرَةً وَبَاطِنَةً ۗ وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَـٰدِلُ فِى ٱللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ وَلَا هُدًى وَلَا كِتَـٰبٍ مُّنِيرٍ
rows.translation: See ye not how Allah hath made serviceable unto you whatsoever is in the skies and whatsoever is in the earth and hath loaded you with His favours both without and within? Yet of mankind is he who disputeth concerning Allah, without knowledge or guidance or a scripture giving light.
rows.transliteration: alam taraw annallāha sakhhara lakum mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi wa-asbagha `alaykum ni`amahu ẓāhiratan wabāṭinah ۗ wa minan nāsi man yujādilu fillāhi bighayri `il-min walā hudan walā kitābin munīr

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ قَالُوا۟ بَلْ نَتَّبِعُ مَا وَجَدْنَا عَلَيْهِ ءَابَآءَنَآ ۚ أَوَلَوْ كَانَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ يَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ عَذَابِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
rows.translation: And if it be said unto them: Follow that which Allah hath revealed, they say: Nay, but we follow that wherein we found our fathers. What! Even though the devil were inviting them unto the doom of flame?
rows.transliteration: wa idhā qīla lahumut-tabi`ū mā anzalallāhu qālū bal nattabi`u mā wajadnā `alayhi ābā-anā ۚ awalaw kānash shayṭānu yad`ūhum ilā `adhābis sa`īr

rows.arabic: وَمَن يُسْلِمْ وَجْهَهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحْسِنٌ فَقَدِ ٱسْتَمْسَكَ بِٱلْعُرْوَةِ ٱلْوُثْقَىٰ ۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْأُمُورِ
rows.translation: Whosoever surrendereth his purpose to Allah while doing good, he verily hath grasped the firm hand-hold. Unto Allah belongeth the sequel of all things.
rows.transliteration: wa man yuslim wajhahu ilallāhi wahuwa muḥsinun faqadis-tamsaka bil `urwatil wuthqā ۗ wa ilallāhi `āqibatul-umūr

rows.arabic: وَمَن كَفَرَ فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ كُفْرُهُۥٓ ۚ إِلَيْنَا مَرْجِعُهُمْ فَنُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
rows.translation: And whosoever disbelieveth, let not his disbelief afflict thee (O Muhammad). Unto Us is their return, and We shall tell them what they did. Lo! Allah is Aware of what is in the breasts (of men).
rows.transliteration: wa man kafara falā yaḥzunka kufruh ۚ ilaynā marji`uhum fanunabbi-uhum bimā `amilū ۚ innallāha `alīmun bidhātiṣ ṣudūr

rows.arabic: نُمَتِّعُهُمْ قَلِيلًا ثُمَّ نَضْطَرُّهُمْ إِلَىٰ عَذَابٍ غَلِيظٍ
rows.translation: We give them comfort for a little, and then We drive them to a heavy doom.
rows.transliteration: numatti`uhum qalīlan thumma naḍṭarruhum ilā `adhābin ghalīẓ

rows.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: If thou shouldst ask them: Who created the heavens and the earth? they would answer: Allah. Say: Praise be to Allah! But most of them know not.
rows.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunnallāh ۚ qulil ḥamdu lillāh ۚ bal aktharuhum lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْغَنِىُّ ٱلْحَمِيدُ
rows.translation: Unto Allah belongeth whatsoever is in the heavens and the earth. Lo! Allah, He is the Absolute, the Owner of Praise.
rows.transliteration: lillāhi mā fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ innallāha huwal ghaniyyul ḥamīd

rows.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِن شَجَرَةٍ أَقْلَـٰمٌ وَٱلْبَحْرُ يَمُدُّهُۥ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ سَبْعَةُ أَبْحُرٍ مَّا نَفِدَتْ كَلِمَـٰتُ ٱللَّهِ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
rows.translation: And if all the trees in the earth were pens, and the sea, with seven more seas to help it, (were ink), the words of Allah could not be exhausted. Lo! Allah is Mighty, Wise.
rows.transliteration: walaw annamā fil-arḍi min shajaratin aqlāmun wal baḥru yamudduhu min ba`dihi sab`atu abḥurin mā nafidat kalimātullāh ۗ innallāha `azīzun ḥakīm

rows.arabic: مَّا خَلْقُكُمْ وَلَا بَعْثُكُمْ إِلَّا كَنَفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۢ بَصِيرٌ
rows.translation: Your creation and your raising (from the dead) are only as (the creation and the raising of) a single soul. Lo! Allah is Hearer, Knower.
rows.transliteration: mā khalqukum walā ba`thukum illā kanafsin wāḥidah ۗ innallāha samī`un baṣīr

rows.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيْلَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِى ٱلَّيْلِ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ كُلٌّ يَجْرِىٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
rows.translation: Hast thou not seen how Allah causeth the night to pass into the day and causeth the day to pass into the night, and hath subdued the sun and the moon (to do their work), each running unto an appointed term; and that Allah is Informed of what ye do?
rows.transliteration: alam tara annallāha yūlijul layla fin nahāri wayūlijun nahāra fil layli wasakhharash shamsa wal qamara kullun yajrī ilā ajalin musamman wa-annallāha bimā ta`malūna khabīr

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَأَنَّ مَا يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلْبَـٰطِلُ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
rows.translation: That (is so) because Allah, He is the True, and that which they invoke beside Him is the False, and because Allah, He is the Sublime, the Great.
rows.transliteration: dhālika bi-annallāha huwal ḥaqqu wa-anna mā yad`ūna min dūnihil bāṭilu wa-annallāha huwal `aliyyul kabīr

rows.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱلْفُلْكَ تَجْرِى فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ بِنِعْمَتِ ٱللَّهِ لِيُرِيَكُم مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٍ شَكُورٍ
rows.translation: Hast thou not seen how the ships glide on the sea by Allah's grace, that He may show you of His wonders? Lo! therein indeed are portents for every steadfast, grateful (heart).
rows.transliteration: alam tara annal fulka tajrī fil baḥri bini`matillāhi liyuriyakum min āyātih ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin likulli ṣabbārin shakūr

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا غَشِيَهُم مَّوْجٌ كَٱلظُّلَلِ دَعَوُا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْبَرِّ فَمِنْهُم مُّقْتَصِدٌ ۚ وَمَا يَجْحَدُ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ إِلَّا كُلُّ خَتَّارٍ كَفُورٍ
rows.translation: And if a wave enshroudeth them like awnings, they cry unto Allah, making their faith pure for Him only. But when He bringeth them safe to land, some of them compromise. None denieth Our signs save every traitor ingrate.
rows.transliteration: wa idhā ghashiyahum mawjun kaẓ ẓulali da`awullāha mukhliṣīna lahud dīna falammā najjāhum ilal-barri faminhum muqtaṣid ۚ wa mā yajḥadu bi-āyātinā illā kullu khattārin kafūr

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ وَٱخْشَوْا۟ يَوْمًا لَّا يَجْزِى وَالِدٌ عَن وَلَدِهِۦ وَلَا مَوْلُودٌ هُوَ جَازٍ عَن وَالِدِهِۦ شَيْـًٔا ۚ إِنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّ ۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْغَرُورُ
rows.translation: O mankind! Keep your duty to your Lord and fear a Day when the parent will not be able to avail the child in aught, nor the child to avail the parent. Lo! Allah's promise is the very truth. Let not the life of the world beguile you, nor let the deceiver beguile you, in regard to Allah.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nāsut-taqū rabbakum wakhshaw yawmal lā yajzī wālidun `an waladihi walā mawlūdun huwa jāzin `an wālidihi shay-ā ۚ inna wa`dallāhi ḥaqq ۖ falā taghurrannakumul ḥayātud dunyā walā yaghurrannakum billāhil gharūr

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥ عِلْمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَيُنَزِّلُ ٱلْغَيْثَ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْحَامِ ۖ وَمَا تَدْرِى نَفْسٌ مَّاذَا تَكْسِبُ غَدًا ۖ وَمَا تَدْرِى نَفْسٌۢ بِأَىِّ أَرْضٍ تَمُوتُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌۢ
rows.translation: Lo! Allah! With Him is knowledge of the Hour. He sendeth down the rain, and knoweth that which is in the wombs. No soul knoweth what it will earn to-morrow, and no soul knoweth in what land it will die. Lo! Allah is Knower, Aware.
rows.transliteration: innallāha `indahu `il-mus sā`ati wayunazzilul ghaytha waya`lamu mā fil-arḥām ۖ wa mā tadrī nafsun mādhā taksibu ghadā ۖ wa mā tadrī nafsun bi-ayyi arḍin tamūt ۚ innallāha `alīmun khabīr
